sentences: Selle poisiga te alles saate päevi näha!
context: The word 'päevi' is the partitive form of 'päev' (day) used in the expression 'päevi näha'. This idiomatic phrase means to have experienced many days, implying someone has been through a lot, endured hardship, or appears worn out from age or experience. It can refer to both literal aging and metaphorical hard times.
